comments.comment: They call him the "Liver king" because his liver has somehow survived all of this
As soon as he said “I was rich before and I’m rich now” set the tone of how terrible this apology was.
It's not an apology. It's damage control.
I SWEAR once the filming in his house was done he went and put the mattress back on the bed and turned on his router again
After he revealed why he lied, my depression was cured. Thanks, Liver King!
His apology is pretty much the perfect I'm-sorry-I-got-caught apology
He has earned his title. Really it takes a liver king to process all the shit he is taking
Felix really gives off good and down to earth vibes, I trust this man to give us an honest take on all this shit
Dude is like:    "Imma smoke a pack of cigs a day, so there's less cigs left for other people"

Saving lives by also making already depressed people poorer from buying his supplements AND making them feel like failures because of the unrealistic expectations he's given of what is possible to achieve naturally.

What a hero.
Pewdiepie isn't just a phase, it's a lifestyle. The gamer, the news anchor, the gym bro, the philosopher, basically the older brother we never met but became a significant part of our lives.
Liver King's apology makes me want to admire Travis Scott's apology even more.
This is why I have so much respect for Noel Deyzel. He’s built, but has openly admitted to not being natural multiple times. He’s just a wholesome dude who’s brutally honest with everything he does.

from the emails you truly get a clear picture of how privileged liver king is. he was already rich and lives on a huge plot of land where he can walk to his own lake and just relax. he already had so many things to allow him to have a great life and the way he chose to "help" others is to sell expensive supplements and claim you can get all he has by following his nine tenets.
moment of silence to the people who ate cow balls 24/7 and thought they could actually achieve his physique

For a youtuber with a large audience, this is really commendable from Felix. I did a presentation on unfair standards for young men in the fitness industry in class a couple weeks ago, and Felix pretty much hit the same notes as the point I was trying to make. I mentioned Chris Hemsworth's fitness app as well and to my surprise, after it was over someone asked me: “is Chris Hemsworth really doing anabolics?”  Thanks to Felix and other influencers talking about this topic, we might hopefully soon see more transparency and awareness about this issue.

Liver King - "Forget about the steroids, I'm here for men's mental health."
Men's mental health - "I'm eating all this raw liver and I'm not getting jacked?"

“You are not the solution, you are the problem”
EXACTLY. Felix is genuinely angry in this video and he should be! Glad to see someone who finally gets it and isn’t just doing the “well I always knew, so I have to act aloof now” angle
He is not sorry for what he did, he is just sorry that the truth came out :D
I love that he delivers his humble apology....from a damn throne.
''If they dont look natural, theyre not natural'' what a line
I like how Pewdie is using his platform to spread the common sense that our society is clearly lacking

Pewds is like a real bro for me. Subscribed for 12 years for now and it feels like we gone through a significant path together. 

Not to be weird but literally I was 18 back then, and now I’m a full grown 30 yo adult man with challenges and responsibilities, building my business and family, living a full life. 

Dude… just understanding the level of appreciation to this man despite we are never met personally is impresses me

The positive comments under his apology video were totally organic and there was no PR company engaged to blitz the comments at all. The fact that they’re all written almost identically is just as natural as his body.
The king of apology videos, you must flex your wealth within the first 30  seconds
Him being shirtless for this is even funnier
PewDiePie, the message was clearly: "People are dying... Those people COULD HAVE INSTEAD BEEN BUYING MY SUPPLEMENTS! This is an injustice and must be resolved."
Seeing PewDiePie being actually upset about this apology fills my heart with hope
It's amazing how many people believed he was cool and natural. Felix naming him "Liver Lies" is brilliant.
He clearly isn't apologising, he's trying to justify it
Thank you for mentioning male body issues. Not taking anything away from female body issues, it's just something people don't discuss.
Sive, you're a saint for fixing the audio on this guy. Thank you soo much!
Nothing like apologizing while sitting in a throne
Watched Felix years ago running around like a madlad trying to get the most dislikes. Now to be honest he has the most level and accurate takes on a lot of stuff. Good job kiddo.

So just to shed some light:

- He takes IGF-1 (which is a direct growth hormone present on numerous cell types)
- He takes CJC which is a analouge of GHRH (Growth hormone releasing hormone) produced by hypothalamus which
stimulates Human growth hormone secretion in Hyphophysis and therefore also IGF-1 secretion
- He takes Ibutamoren which is a Ghrelin receptor stimulant (the hormone produced by the stomach who lets us feel hungry)
and also leads to IGF-1 secretion (Hunger->Eating->Nutrients->potential cell regeneration)
- He takes Omnitrope which is effectively Human Growth hormone -> IGF-1 secretion
Added up with three kinds of steroids. This is the most straight way into cancer. 
Anabolic substances (especially hormones) always influence cancer growth, heck there are even whole cancer cell lines 
who cant even be activated without IGF-1. What a dimwit.

Plus that he looks like this and not even bigger means he doesnt train enough or properly and/or (funny enough) doesnt eat enough or properly.
Otherwise he would look more like a small Jay Cutler rather than this.
I love how Felix is so casually sane about stuff. King of Utube indeed.

What a non-apology he has there.. I don't work out but the parallel for me is skincare. 10+ years ago I have low self-esteem because of my skin (oily, acne prone, sensitive). I tried following celebrities' and influencers' skincare routines and nothing worked. Then slowly I realised all of them have great skin because they go to dermatological and aesthetics clinics, not because of the whatever products they use or their 10-step skincare routine. Now I have better self-esteem and accept my skin as it is.
Honestly I love how Felix is putting awareness on these men's/fitness issues and body image problems.

I despise how Liver King is trying to pass his brand as "the solution to male depression" when he is the equivalent of beauty magazines advertising expensive beauty products and claiming you can look like a photoshopped model. So damn entitled
Pewds calling out ppl on their shit is something I enjoy
Good to see how experienced Felix is at apology videos these days.

I had a conversation with a colleague who actually does exercise naturally and actually does not believe in steroids and even he was like "dude does not love his body if he's using steroids to make it better." And he's a huge fitness nut
If I had a dollar for every time liverking said "I'm here to set the record straight"
You actually gave really good insight on this and were informative, good job Pewdiepie.
The Liver King is now officially a YouTuber with his first insincere apology video!
I've always been cautious of people claiming to help the young, the sick, the depressed, etc. A lot of times it feels like code for taking advantage of those parties.

As someone trying to improve myself and work on my body I’ve had a hard time seeing people on steroids and claiming they aren’t. I constantly remind myself to try to ignore them and to focus on my own personal growth, but it feels good to see someone this big get caught in their lies. Thank you Felix for being someone that I can actually look to.
" I don't think caveman have whatever shopping list you had " line killed me
I feel bad for not watching you more, Pewds. You've grown into quite a respectable man. I'm so proud of you and proud to call myself a bro.

damn even pewds reacting to liverking lol

It's funny. A gamer who doesn't even see himself as a fitness influencer is a thousand times better than actual fitness influencers.

I admire pewds for talking about body image issues and stuff of the sort that men go through. A lot of men dont talk about that but its cool and strong of pewds to advocate for validating issues that men go through while media and others just ignore it
You know it's gonna be a good apology when they start it with mentioning how rich they are
Man the entire video I was looking at Felix's clock in the background, and him doing this in like one take is so impressive

Thanks for the inspo Felix, you've given me the push I needed to walk this road to building my body up and restore my mental health.
Love you brother and thank you for everything you say/do!!
After around 13-14 solid years of watching YouTube, your channel has the same vibe, makes me feel young again I love it.
Had a old coworker tell me "If he's on steroids I'll eat my shoes" looks like Joey has   to eat
Pewds looking like he's been following the 7 ancestral tenets.
God damn I love this channel. Felix never fails to put out great content, and I’m sorry about Maya to you 3. Hope the healing process goes okay.
"You are not the solution, you are the problem." BOOOM!!! PewDiePie said it all right there.
Are we gonna ignore the fact that pewds body transformation is awesome!! Extremely impressive knowing that it's 100% natural! Props to you Felix!!
I NEVER CLICKED A VIDEO SO FAST

I like how whenever some youtuber apologizes, the first thing they start their apology with is flexing with their wealth and talking about how proud they are of themselves, how hard they work and how many great things they did
Truly one of the most apology videos of all time
1:36 felix's awareness of the video having L audio output for him to then put it on R is so funny
That's why we love daddy Noel. He's honest about the things he take.
A true apology is when you apologize before you are caught and not after.
I love that pewdiepie is doing tlc type videos with ken and drama apology videos again. This was my favorite content from him
Bros retired and still doing an amazing job

Apologising can be very difficult, but it not complicated. All you have to do is hold your hands up and admit you screwed up. Say 'I'm sorry I did this bad thing, I'm working on fixing this about myself so there won't be a repeat.' Anything else just feels like manipulation

I haven't been working out a lot recently, and I feel like Liver King gave me that surge of motivation I needed to lose more weight than I already have this year, because at the end of the day, just by being on this mat and being honest to others and myself, I already know I'm better than him.
Can we just appreciate how much time and effort he puts in lying to us...
5:10 "you are the problem, you are not the solution" banger truth bomb line.

Thank you for making videos like this. For people like me who are trying their damndest to work hard and build their physique naturally, it's good to see you using your platform to help spread awareness to liars like this.
I think it's so funny that the most replayed part of the video is 10:49 when felix takes of his shirt
IMO, liver King will historically be remembered as a meme
Truly one of the apologies of all time.
You’re spot on. He is 100% contributing to the problem he claims to be trying to solve. He’s a grifter acting under the guise of a compassionate family man hoping to solve your problems
2:08 is so funny reaction but also so true
Pewds is the master of apology ratings
The apology needed more deep breaths

You are spot on about wanting to get people into fitness and working out simply because it feels good, and it is a good habit. People's motivation is often the reason why they quit or develop issues. It is not a good idea to develop yourself based off of ego or negative things, it will always collapse.
Pewdiepie and MPMD was a crossover in my life I would’ve never expected
Wow i guess when I was depressed a few years back instead of going to therapy I should have just slept on a wooden floor and taken beef organ supplements. Thanks liver King.
The apology king is back.
W mention of the grizzly diety conqueror of Cardio and lifter of legends
He is not sorry for misleading millions, he is sorry for getting caught.
12 years later and Felix is still one of my heroes
Man the very opening of that "apology" had me imagining him wiping the tears away with his cash.
Love your videos man. On point and entertaining ever time
I used to watch pewds all the time and I’m now starting to get into his content again and it’s really good for me just reminiscing
Can we all apreciate how much effort he puts into lying to us?

i like how he said that people should try out exercising because it can make you feel good. he didnt say that it would make you healthier but rather that it can be good for your mood. usually when people promote or hear about exercise its usually just about getting strong or fit or thin, emphasizing about physical health benefits, but even just casual exercise like going out on walks or doing simple ones like wall push ups or lunges can improve your mood.
His apology made me apologize to him for finding out.
This is the reason why you would never lose some of your subscribers pewds. You are as real as the come and you will be respected for that no matter what.

"You need help for your apology video?
Just ask Felix! He's got experience, expertize, ..."
- Gloria Borger (2018)

Pewdiepie your workout routine video you did a long time ago motivated me to start working out. As a person who’s always been thin and constantly told that I look like a skeleton despite me eating a normal amount and having no problems this change has made me more confident in my body. People will probably look at me and notice no difference but I notice the muscle and definition I’ve built from just following your routine for 6 months now. Thanks for the inspiration I would love to see an updated workout routine if you have changed it.
"you are the problem, you are not the solution" at 5:10 got me dying XD
You nailed it when he said Who am I cheating?  He cheated everyone one of those “hurting young men”.

I love the progression and maturation of Pewds over the last 10 yrs. Love to see it

Eating disorders and body dysmorphia are so so much present and normalized with boys( girls too, but it’s different since we talk and now more the signs, where the symptoms for boys are more subtitle, because “boys don’t cry” u know)  and gym culture, i’m glad pewds talks about this subject because it is very important

Dude, Pew, you literally make me laugh out loud. Please bring back Pew News haha. This was glorious.
Watched this while working out. Very motivational. Thanks Felix
More vids like this pls,so entertaining
Pewds has mastered every stage of the internet, and is now in god mode. I vote him to be the moral compass of the Internet

Felix i love your mindset on steroids and on workout in general. We really should be working out just to feel better physically and mentally not focus on the body changes. They come as a bonus but you dont start the journey for that reason.
Pewds vid is the last of like 3 vids ive seen commenting on this whole situation and I still feel like pewds did it the best, genuinely still the best out here, we love you pewds ️
I want a fitness influence that says "do steroids" but is found out to be all natural.
the true king of Youtube apology videos has spoken
I like how he brought up the whole " im saving people " not once on any video has he said this is for other people
He seriously dragged that chair to basement to defend himself from not cheating the whole audience lmao.

Honestly, gaining muscle is such a pain in the ass. I didn’t know about the steroids celebrities use and joined the gym a while back thinking I’d get all jacked up just by working out and eating healthy. The first year at gym I gained like 600gms. Then quit out of frustration. Then took a year break, did some research, joined back again. This time increased protein intake (more meat days in a week) and was able to get to 64kilos from 62kilos in 8 months. I feel amazing. I know this is kind of slow, but I’m really proud of it.

Edit: Thanks for all the support people . But I think I may have mislead some of you to believe I gained 2kilos of pure muscle. I have not. I have also gained some fat around my waist area. I have definitely seen muscle gains (chest and triceps seem to be most noticeable) but, I have also gained fat.

Thanks for speaking up on male body dysmorphia. As a woman who watches a lot of male gym vloggers, it’s quite apparent when some guys have orthorexia! Whenever I bring it up however, guys will always bash what I have to say and say they’re just dedicated and hardworking unlike me because they don’t respect my word. It’s refreshing to see men actually shine some light on the issue and how prevalent it is
wat steroids does liver king use its almost too late to order stuff for christmas

It’s always a good video when Felix spits straight facts no matter who might get “offended”(god forbid we offend scumbags who lie to cheat people out of money)

I will have to say one thing, Felix may say or do plenty of controversial things but one thing I’ve always noticed is that he has ALWAYS been upfront with us about things that are relevant to his audience , he’s never cheated people or lied to them for money or clout. 
He may have made plenty of mistakes while growing into YouTube fame but dishonesty has never been one of them. Bravo to both Felix and Ken for being one of the real ones since day one.
He needs to make another apology video for his first apology video
It maybe a disshonest apology and one that was made as a reaponse to him being exposed. But you can't deny that the part where he apologized then said "It's liverin time!" Struck millions of hearts.
He apologized “in character.” . The whole thing is an investment for him. Even with the controversy, he made many millions.
I was waiting on someone to do this. Thanks Pewd’s !

just love ur content pewds been watching for a long ass time just wanted to comment saying keep doing whatever u love and keeps u happy and that youre doing an amazing job making people genuinely happy.

I've been heavy into fitness since I was 14 (past 8 years) and have seen a huge push for honesty in the fitness industry as of late. To see people with large platforms exposing dishonest crooks such as Liver King is truly a treat. Also, awesome progress Felix, keep it up!
